column4: Regardless of video format or what player im playing it in, my videos wash out white sporadically and randomly during an X session .. a restart of X fixes this, anyone have any ideas to why or how i can fix this? its quite annoying ..
gstreamer backend, xine does it too ..
if gnome is installed and you run that install kubuntu-desktop does it replace gnome?
you get boot and can choose which desktop you want at login
